summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal sewerage utility; authorizing the construction of the Alki Sewage Treatment Plant on City property in the vicinity of Beach Drive and Benton Place, together with the reconstruction of the sewage pumping station in the vicinity of Beach Drive and West Spokane Street, and the construction of necessary outfalls, force mains, etc., as a part of the additions, betterments and extensions to said utility contemplated by plan and system Ordinance No. 84391; making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund as an advance to capital account therefor; and repealing Ordinance No. 79989 as amended by Ordinance Nos. 81033 and 82215.
